_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The diversity of elements for each sense: The eye element, agreeable sights, and eye consciousness
Pleasant feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant
The eye element, disagreeable sights, and eye consciousness
Painful feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful
The eye element, sights that are a basis for equanimity, and eye consciousness
Neutral feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral
The ear element, agreeable sounds, and ear consciousness
Pleasant feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant
The ear element, disagreeable sounds, and ear consciousness
Painful feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful
The ear element, sounds that are a basis for equanimity, and ear consciousness
Neutral feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral
The nose element, agreeable smells, and nose consciousness
Pleasant feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant
The nose element, disagreeable smells, and nose consciousness
Painful feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful
The nose element, smells that are a basis for equanimity, and nose consciousness
Neutral feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral
The tongue element, agreeable tastes, and tongue consciousness
Pleasant feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant
The tongue element, disagreeable tastes, and tongue consciousness
Painful feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful
The tongue element, tastes that are a basis for equanimity, and tongue consciousness
Neutral feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral
The body element, agreeable touches, and body consciousness
Pleasant feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant
The body element, disagreeable touches, and body consciousness
Painful feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful
The body element, touches that are a basis for equanimity, and body consciousness
Neutral feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral
The mind element, agreeable thoughts, and mind consciousness
Pleasant feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as pleasant
The mind element, disagreeable thoughts, and mind consciousness
Painful feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as painful
The mind element, thoughts that are a basis for equanimity, and mind consciousness
Neutral feeling arising dependent on a contact to be experienced as neutral.
